name: THE BOUNCY DUMBLOLINE!!
description:
"Gizmo has asked you to help her perform a silly trampoline stunt alongside some of her fellow Dumblotraight friends: Alora, Broccolina, Dotty & Boris!
Your only job is to move the trampoline! Simple, right?"

I commissioned this minigame from Kindly_Alligator!
So while I made all the assets, characters & concept; the game, like the coding and creation of the game, was made entirely by them!

You move the trampoline with the use of your mouse, and your objective is endurance: Try to keep the show going without 3 of the Dumblotraights falling to the ground or you'll lose! What'll be your highscore?

GAME MADE BY KINDLY_ALLIGATOR & ME !!
DOTTY'S VOICELINES BY NOLA KLOP!
Characters & World by me, they can be read about here!

Ps... The music can be bought on my BandCamp!
